scripts.template:
Hi {Name}, this is {Your Name}. How are you?

[Small talk - 30 seconds]

The reason I'm calling is I noticed you're in the {industry} space, and I work with businesses like yours who are looking to {achieve goal}.

Do you have a couple minutes to chat?

Great! So tell me, what's your biggest challenge right now when it comes to {topic}?

[Listen actively]

I see. And how long has this been an issue?

[Listen]

What have you tried so far to address it?

[Listen]

If you could wave a magic wand, what would the ideal solution look like?
scripts.key_points: Ask open questions. Listen 70%, talk 30%. Take notes.

scripts.template:
Hi {Name}, {Your Name} here. Thanks for taking my call.

I know you're busy, so I'll be brief. I help {target audience} {achieve specific result}, and based on what I've seen with your business, I think there might be a strong fit.

Before I share more, can I ask you a few quick questions to make sure this is relevant for you?
scripts.key_points: Respect their time. Quick value statement. Permission to continue.
Tie back to their specific situation. Use numbers. Ask for micro-commitment.

scripts.template:
Good {morning/afternoon} {Name}, {Your Name} from {Company}.

I appreciate you making time for this call. I've reviewed your operation and I believe we have an opportunity to {specific outcome} that could significantly impact your {metric}.

I have {timeframe} blocked - does that still work for you?

scripts.key_points: Data-driven. Custom insights. Clear roadmap. Professional presentation.
